title: I Want to Protect My Daughter
description:
Christine is worried about her daughter who recently broke off her engagement and found a new man online that she wants to shack-up with. - Dr. Laura: "We only have control of our side of the fence."

What have your grown children done that shocked or surprised you? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
